short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the categories back to YouTubeâ„¢

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google removed the YouTube categories from the description of videos. This extension allows you to easily see YouTube video categories again in place of the subscriber count of a channel. If you're just curious, or need to view these categories for web filtering, YouTube Categories will give you back the information you were missing.
